name: Capture Tower
description:
This is a tower defense game where you do no actual tower placement. You use your main tower to attack or convert enemies to your side. You'll have to still manage your mana or you'll be overwhelmed! Convert different types of units wisely and at the correct time to beat the game.

As you play - imagine the Bishop from Age of Empire going : "WOO LOO LOO"

Left-Mouse Button - Fire tower laser.
Right-Mouse Button - Convert target unit.

This is a team of 6 people coming together to do a crazy game jam. Most of us are first timers.

Developers:

Calvin Phung: https://rynsargent.itch.io/
